00020 #ifndef OPENRAVE_SENSORSYSTEM_H
00021 #define OPENRAVE_SENSORSYSTEM_H
00022 
00023 namespace OpenRAVE {
00024 
00028 class OPENRAVE_API SensorSystemBase : public InterfaceBase
00029 {
00030 public:
00031     SensorSystemBase(EnvironmentBasePtr penv) : InterfaceBase(PT_SensorSystem, penv) {
00032     }
00033     virtual ~SensorSystemBase() {
00034     }
00035 
00037     static inline InterfaceType GetInterfaceTypeStatic() {
00038         return PT_SensorSystem;
00039     }
00040 
00042     virtual void Reset() = 0;
00043 
00045     virtual void AddRegisteredBodies(const std::vector<KinBodyPtr>& vbodies) = 0;
00046 
00049     virtual KinBody::ManageDataPtr AddKinBody(KinBodyPtr pbody, XMLReadableConstPtr pdata) = 0;
00051     virtual bool RemoveKinBody(KinBodyPtr pbody) = 0;
00053     virtual bool IsBodyPresent(KinBodyPtr pbody) = 0;
00055     virtual bool EnableBody(KinBodyPtr pbody, bool bEnable) = 0;
00056 
00060     virtual bool SwitchBody(KinBodyPtr pbody1, KinBodyPtr pbody2) = 0;
00061 
00062 protected:
00063     virtual void SetManageData(KinBodyPtr pbody, KinBody::ManageDataPtr data) {
00064         pbody->SetManageData(data);
00065     }
00066 
00067 private:
00068     virtual const char* GetHash() const {
00069         return OPENRAVE_SENSORSYSTEM_HASH;
00070     }
00071 };
00072 
00074 class OPENRAVE_API SimpleSensorSystem : public SensorSystemBase
00075 {
00076 public:
00077     class OPENRAVE_API XMLData : public XMLReadable {
00078 public:
00079         XMLData(const std::string& xmlid) : XMLReadable(xmlid), id(0) {
00080         }
00081         virtual void copy(boost::shared_ptr<XMLData const> pdata) {
00082             *this = *pdata;
00083         }
00084 
00085         std::string sid;         
00086         int id;
00087         std::string strOffsetLink;         
00088         Transform transOffset,transPreOffset;         // final offset = transOffset * transReturnedFromVision * transPreOffset
00089 
00090         friend class SimpleSensorSystem;
00091     };
00092 
00093     class OPENRAVE_API BodyData : public KinBody::ManageData {
00094 public:
00095         BodyData(SensorSystemBasePtr psensorsystem, KinBodyPtr pbody, boost::shared_ptr<XMLData> initdata) : KinBody::ManageData(psensorsystem), _initdata(initdata), bPresent(false), bEnabled(true), bLock(false)
00096         {
00097             SetBody(pbody);
00098         }
00099 
00100         virtual XMLReadableConstPtr GetData() const {
00101             return _initdata;
00102         }
00103         virtual KinBody::LinkPtr GetOffsetLink() const {
00104             return KinBody::LinkPtr(_plink);
00105         }
00106 
00107         virtual bool IsPresent() const {
00108             return bPresent;
00109         }
00110         virtual bool IsEnabled() const {
00111             return bEnabled;
00112         }
00113         virtual bool IsLocked() const {
00114             return bLock;
00115         }
00116         virtual bool Lock(bool bDoLock) {
00117             bLock = bDoLock; return true;
00118         }
00119 
00120         virtual int GetId() {
00121             return _initdata->id;
00122         }
00123         virtual const std::string& GetSid() {
00124             return _initdata->sid;
00125         }
00126         virtual const Transform& GetRecentTransform() {
00127             return tnew;
00128         }
00129 
00130 protected:
00131         virtual void SetBody(KinBodyPtr pbody)
00132         {
00133             KinBody::LinkPtr plink;
00134             if( _initdata->strOffsetLink.size() > 0 )
00135                 plink = pbody->GetLink(_initdata->strOffsetLink);
00136             if( !plink )
00137                 plink = pbody->GetLinks().front();
00138             _plink = plink;
00139         }
00140 
00141         boost::shared_ptr<XMLData> _initdata;
00142         uint64_t lastupdated;
00143         Transform tnew;         
00144 
00145         bool bPresent;
00146         bool bEnabled;
00147         bool bLock;
00148 
00149         KinBody::LinkWeakPtr _plink;
00150         friend class SimpleSensorSystem;
00151     };
00152 
00153     class OPENRAVE_API SimpleXMLReader : public BaseXMLReader
00154     {
00155 public:
00156         SimpleXMLReader(boost::shared_ptr<XMLData>);
00157         virtual XMLReadablePtr GetReadable() {
00158             return _pdata;
00159         }
00160         virtual ProcessElement startElement(const std::string& name, const AttributesList& atts);
00161         virtual bool endElement(const std::string& name);
00162         virtual void characters(const std::string& ch);
00163 
00164 protected:
00165         boost::shared_ptr<XMLData> _pdata;
00166         std::stringstream ss;
00167     };
00168 
00170     static UserDataPtr RegisterXMLReaderId(EnvironmentBasePtr penv, const std::string& xmlid);
00171 
00172     SimpleSensorSystem(const std::string& xmlid, EnvironmentBasePtr penv);
00173     virtual ~SimpleSensorSystem();
00174 
00175     virtual void Reset();
00176 
00177     virtual void AddRegisteredBodies(const std::vector<KinBodyPtr>& vbodies);
00178     virtual KinBody::ManageDataPtr AddKinBody(KinBodyPtr pbody, XMLReadableConstPtr pdata);
00179 
00180     virtual bool RemoveKinBody(KinBodyPtr pbody);
00181     virtual bool IsBodyPresent(KinBodyPtr pbody);
00182     virtual bool EnableBody(KinBodyPtr pbody, bool bEnable);
00183     virtual bool SwitchBody(KinBodyPtr pbody1, KinBodyPtr pbody2);
00184 
00185 protected:
00186     typedef std::pair<boost::shared_ptr<BodyData>, Transform > SNAPSHOT;
00187     typedef std::map<int,boost::shared_ptr<BodyData> > BODIES;
00188     virtual boost::shared_ptr<BodyData> CreateBodyData(KinBodyPtr pbody, boost::shared_ptr<XMLData const> pdata);
00189     virtual void _UpdateBodies(std::list<SNAPSHOT>& listbodies);
00190     virtual void _UpdateBodiesThread();
00191 
00192     virtual void SetRecentTransform(boost::shared_ptr<BodyData> pdata, const Transform& t) {
00193         pdata->tnew = t;
00194     }
00195 
00197     static BaseXMLReaderPtr CreateXMLReaderId(const std::string& xmlid, InterfaceBasePtr ptr, const AttributesList& atts);
00198 
00199     std::string _xmlid;
00200     BODIES _mapbodies;
00201     boost::mutex _mutex;
00202     uint64_t _expirationtime;     
00203     bool _bShutdown;
00204     boost::thread _threadUpdate;
00205 };
